General.Name: Turk Ilac ve Serum Sanayi AS
General.Description: Turk Ilac Ve Serum Sanayi Anonim Sirketi produces and sells human drugs and vaccines in Turkey. It offers basic IV solutions, premix solutions, SVP solutions, hemodialysis solutions, irrigation products, diagnostic products, and immunostimulant products. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.
General.Address: Bügdüz Mah. Enver Pasa Cad. No:8 Akyurt, Ankara, Turkey, 06750
